question.text:
For the following columns, match the biomolecules with their type and function.
 
  Biomolecule   Function   Type
1 Rennin I Chemical messenger i Coenzyme
2 Testosterone II Breaking milk protein ii Polysaccharide
3 Vitamin niacin III Storage energy iii Lipid
4 Starch IV Activate biocatalyst iv Polypeptide

options.text: <math><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text: Rennin is a type of enzyme that is a protein (polypeptide) found in the stomach of the infant helping in digesting milk sugars. Testosterone is a hormone that acts as the chemical messenger in endocrine system which is a type of steroid coming under lipid category due to hydrophobic nature and insolubility in water. Starch is a polysaccharide of glucose which is a storage form of carbohydrate in plants. Cofactors are non-protein components attached to enzyme which help in activating them. Vitamin niacin is a type of cofactors coming under the group of co-enzyme.
